original_text: God gave Peter the authority to be his apostle to the Jews. God also gave me the authority to be his apostle to the Gentiles.
korean_text: 베드로에게 역사하사 그를 할례자의 사도로 삼으신 이가 또한 내게 역사하사 나를 이방인의 사도로 삼으셨느니라

sentences.original_text: to be his apostle to the Jews
God also gave me the authority
to be his apostle to the Gentiles
